title: Encore: 'Kangaroo And Joey Too'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Recorded live with musicians from the Boston Symphony Orchestra as part of our 2019 summer pop-up series, this Aboriginal story from Australia imagines how the kangaroo got her indispensable pouch.
itunes:author: WBUR
